title: Random Dc's
body: So, I just played a ranked game as Jax, but for some odd reason I kept disconnecting at random times. However, during the times I interconnected, I checked if I could still open my browser and for some reason I could. I could also check my skype messages during that time so, I know my connection was pretty much fine. Anybody have any idea on what this was about since that did not happen in any other games that I played today at all.

replies.body: I'm not aware of any server issues that happened during this time.  If you're still experiencing this problem, then you could be having an issue specifically staying connected to the game server.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
